channel.description: Recent content in redis on Darshit Patel's Blog

item.title: How to achieve a 50% reduction in Redis memory usage
item.description: Yes, you read that right. To give you some context, some time ago, our (my org’s) Redis usage was un-tracked – meaning we didn’t know why our Redis memory was being occupied as much as it was.
